duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement behavioral support interventions and activities based on individual needs and ongoing assessment.
Provide Applied Behavioral Analysis (ABA) - Functional Behavioral Assessment and development of a Behavioral Support Plan.
Supervise RVT/Behavior Support Specialist staff as needed.
Provide training and supervision to support staff providing ABA services.
Modify the Behavioral Support Plan based on frequent, systematic evaluation of direct observational data.
Cooperate with the licensee and department staff in any inspection, inquiry, or investigation.
Provide coordinated support with program staff and participate as part of the clinical team.
Share on-call coverage with other clinicians to ensure around the clock crisis response.
Be exposed to various medical conditions and communicable diseases.

education_certification.credential: Master’s Level Board Certified Behavioral Analyst
